name: Oger the Cold: Broomstick Brawl
description:
Fight against enemies using matching elements while dodging the obstacles of the forest. The wizard will follow your mouse. Use the mouse to shoot and switch between elements with 1-3 but remember:

  • Water elementals are immune to fire but vulnerable to lightning
  • Lightning elementals are immune to water but vulnerable to fire.
  • Fire elementals are immune to lightning but vulnerable to water.

The wizard will die if you hit an obstacle or have ten enemies on the screen at once.

Sound Attributions:

  • "Fire Burst.wav" by SilverIllusionist, https://freesound.org/people/SilverIllusionist/sounds/472688/
  • "Magic Lighting Spell Impact & Punch" by EminYildirim, https://freesound.org/people/EminYildirim/sounds/541480/
  • "Freeze Impact" by JustInvoke, https://freesound.org/people/JustInvoke/sounds/446139/
  • "IceSpell03.wav" by alonsotm, https://freesound.org/people/alonsotm/sounds/396499/
